TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IContextManager

summary.span: 定义一个允许在通道上获取和设置上下文的接口。

span.span: Defines an interface that allows you to get and set the context on the channel.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否已启用上下文管理的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the context management is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了上下文，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the context is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用上下文管理时，上下文通道将在其生存期内缓存上下文。When context management is enabled the context channel caches the context in its lifetime. 通过对通道调用 `IContextManager` 方法，可以通过通道属性 从通道检索上下文。Context can be retrieved from the channel through the `IContextManager` channel property by calling method on it. 在通过对通道属性调用 方法以打开通道之前，还可以使用上下文来预先初始化通道。The channel can also be pre-initialized with context before being opened by calling the method on the channel property. 在使用上下文初始化通道之后，将不能重置通道。Once the channel is initialized with context it cannot be reset. 以下是此模式下的固定行为：The following are invariants in this mode: - 打开通道后，对 的任何调用都将引发一个 `InvalidOperationException`。Any call to after the channel is open throws an `InvalidOperationException`. - 任何试图通过在传出消息中使用 `ContextMessageProperty` 来发送上下文的操作都会引发 `InvalidOperationException`。Any attempt to send context through the `ContextMessageProperty` in an outgoing message throws `InvalidOperationException`. - 在已使用上下文对通道进行初始化之后，如果使用上下文从服务器接收消息，则会引发 `ProtocolException`。If a message is received from the server with context, when the channel is already initialized with a context a `ProtocolException` is thrown. 请注意，如果打开通道时没有显式设置上下文，则可以从服务器接收初始上下文。Note that you can receive initial context from a server if the channel is opened without explicitly setting the context. - 传入消息上的 `ContextMessageProperty` 始终为 `null`。The `ContextMessageProperty` on an incoming message is always `null`. 未启用上下文管理时，上下文通道并不对上下文进行管理，When context management is not enabled, the context channel does not manage context. 而是由应用程序负责通过 `ContextMessageProperty` 来检索、管理和应用上下文。It is the application's responsibility to retrieve, manage and apply context through the `ContextMessageProperty`. 任何通过 通道属性来调用 或 `IContextManager` 的尝试都会导致 `InvalidOperationException`。Any attempt to call or using through the `IContextManager` channel property results in `InvalidOperationException`. 除上下文 HTTP Cookie 以外，所有 HTTP Cookie 都在通道级进行处理。All HTTP cookies, except for context HTTP cookies, are handled at the channel level. 上下文 HTTP Cookie 在应用程序级进行管理。Context HTTP cookies are managed at the application level. 在共享通道以便与 所针对的不同实例对话时，这可能导致意外的结果。This can have unexpected consequences when channels are shared to talk to different instances targeted by . 下表显示将 设置为 `true` 或 `false` 时对 HTTP Cookie 的影响。The following table shows how HTTP cookies are affected when is set to either `true` or `false`. |绑定Binding|IContextManager.Enabled 值IContextManager.Enabled Value|上下文 HTTP Cookie 范围Context HTTP Cookie Scope|其他 HTTP Cookie 范围Other HTTP Cookies Scope| |-------------|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------------------| |BasicHttpBindingBasicHttpBinding|n/an/a|ChannelFactoryChannelFactory|ChannelFactoryChannelFactory| |BasicHttpContextBindingBasicHttpContextBinding|truetrue|通道Channel|通道Channel| |BasicHttpContextBindingBasicHttpContextBinding|Falsefalse|对于每个消息（由应用程序显式管理）For each message (explicitly managed by application)|通道Channel|

span.span: The of key/value pairs with the namespace and name of the context.

param.name: context
